证据片段: Hydrogen loading is performed on $5 0 \mathrm { c m }$ long cladding segments by the electrolytic process at Electricité de France (EDF)-Les Renardières [32]. A 600 wppm concentration is targeted, corresponding to a typical Zircaloy-4 end-of-life hydrogen content.

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_015_chunk6
证据片段: The total loading duration is $1 6 0 \mathrm { ~ h ~ }$ (at room temperature), followed by $^ { 2 4 \mathrm { ~ h ~ } }$ annealing at $4 3 0 ^ { \circ } \mathrm { C }$ .

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_015_chunk6
证据片段: Pre-homogenization in the $\beta$ domain: Tubes are cut into $2 \mathrm { \ c m }$ long samples, sealed under vacuum in quartz vials, heat-treated at $1 0 5 0 ^ { \circ } \mathrm { C }$ (thus in the $\beta { \bf Z r }$ domain) for $5 \mathrm { { m i n } }$ , and cooled down in the furnace by turning it off for full homogenization of the H concentration and isotropic texture.

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_015_chunk6
证据片段: Hydrogen and oxygen contents are thus determined individually for each sample to check the tightness of the vials.
